body:
'userProfile' ->returns an object containing a list of dummy users profiles
{ 'users':[{'username':'name','profile':'https://linktoimage','email':'email@email.com'}]}

'userAuth' ->returns an object of containing a list of dummy users auth data. The schema is
{ 'users':[{'username':'exampleuser','email':'example@ddapi.com','password':'examplepassword'}] }

'reviews' -> returns a list of reviews from different users with the schema being
{'reviews':[{'username':'name','email':'email@email.com','profile':'https://linktoimage','review':'users review here','likes':'dislikes'}]}

'blog' -> represent a blog and has the schema that looks like
{'blogs':[{'author':'exampleauthorname','published':'DD/MM/YYYY','title':'Blog title','paragraphs':['Par1','Par2',...,ParN]},'reviews':[{'user':{'profile_pic',:'linktoimage','username':'username'},'review':{'review':'This is the users review','date':'DD/MM/YYYY','time':'HH:MM','likes':Number,dislikes:Number}}...],'likes':Number,dislikes:Number]}
